title: Gave up the Booty
itunes:author: ESPN, Bomani Jones
itunes:subtitle: The Right Time: Jimmy G and Mahomes fumble Super Bowl appearances, Game Cheatin' stories!
content:encoded:
Bomani Jones says "I told you so" as 49ers QB Jimmy Garoppolo throws away his team's chances at a Super Bowl appearance against the Rams (1:22) and has to "eat crow" as Bengals QB Joe Burrow upsets Patrick Mahomes and the Chiefs in the AFC Championship (13:25). Plus, an IYHH including the SAT going "fully digital" (24:12) and your voicemails from when the game was "cheatin'" (35:17)!


IYHH Stories

  1. @yaffaesque discusses “The Great Siberian Thaw”, what happens as ancient microbes begin to melt: https://bit.ly/3HibjNw
  2. @LRosenblatt_ shares that Washington state’s attorney general has sued Google over location tracking: https://bit.ly/3ofAZmp
  3. @ElissaNadworny shares that starting in 2024, U.S. students will take the SAT entirely online: https://n.pr/3ANKNJn
